document: AUTOMATIC GENERATION OF THERMODYNAMIC NETWORKS by Gerald Gruber B.Ch.E., City College of New York (1959) S.M., Massachusetts Institute of Technology (1961) Submitted in Partial Fulfillment of the Requirements for the Degree of Doctor of Science at the MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY September 1964 Signature of Author Department of Chemical Engineering Certified by Thesis Supervisor, Robert C.
